meta.title: Dev Learning Apps – Learn Programming from Scratch | Python, SQL, Flutter, HTML
meta.description: Learn SQL, Python, HTML and Flutter with interactive apps, integrated IDE and guided learning paths. Over 1,500 downloads and 4.8 rating!
meta.keywords: learn programming, python course, sql course, flutter course, html course, programming for beginners, educational apps, DevLearning, mobile programming, integrated IDE, programming certification, practical programming lessons

home_work_future_title: The Future of Work is Now
home_work_subtitle: Remote work, home office and flexibility are no longer trends - they are the current reality. Technology professionals need to constantly adapt and learn new skills.
home_work_highlight_digital_skills_descr: Programming and technology are essential for the future
home_work_highlight_learn_anywhere_descr: Study at your own time, at your own pace, wherever you are
home_work_cta_text: Don't get left behind. Learn the most in-demand programming languages in the market with our practical and accessible apps. Start your programming journey today.
help_page_subtitle: Find quick answers to your questions about our apps
help_faq_forgot_password_q: I forgot my password. How to recover?
help_faq_forgot_password_a: Tap "Forgot my password" and follow the recovery email. Check Spam/Trash and confirm the email entered.
help_faq_multiple_devices_q: Can I use the same account on more than one device?
help_faq_multiple_devices_a: Yes. Log in with the same email. Progress and premium sync when opening connected.
help_faq_changed_phone_q: I changed phones. Will I lose my access?
help_faq_changed_phone_a: No. Install the app and enter with the same email. If it doesn't unlock, use "Restore access".
help_faq_premium_not_activated_q: I paid and premium didn't unlock. What do I do?
help_faq_premium_not_activated_a: Reopen the app online, check the purchase account and tap "Restore access". If it persists, send proof.
help_faq_full_pass_website_q: I bought the Complete Pass on the website. How do I use it in the apps?
help_faq_full_pass_website_a: Enter with the same email used on the website and go to Profile → Restore access.
help_faq_separate_premium_q: Can I buy premium for each app separately?
help_faq_separate_premium_a: Yes. Each app has its own price. The Complete Pass unlocks all.
help_faq_duplicate_charge_q: I received a duplicate charge. How to proceed?
help_faq_duplicate_charge_a: Check the store/website order history and send the proof through the form.
help_faq_report_bug_a: Send description, steps, screenshots/video, device model, OS version and app version through the form.
help_faq_bought_with_other_account_q: I bought with another store account.
help_faq_bought_with_other_account_a: Access stays in the purchase account. Send the order and correct account for us to evaluate options.
help_contact_section_subtitle: Contact us and we'll respond as quickly as possible
home_about_creator_description: Hello! I'm Airton Freitas, the sole developer behind the Learning SQL, Learning Python and Learning Flutter apps. I build everything from scratch: content, code, design, publishing and continuous maintenance in stores.
home_about_creator_contact: Want to talk to me, get news or opportunities? Add me on LinkedIn.
home_html_app_subtitle: Learn HTML5 from scratch with practical lessons and HTML Editor
home_html_download_google_play: Download Learning HTML on Google Play
home_html_download_apple_store: Download Learning HTML on App Store

apps_page.title: Programming Apps - Learning Python, SQL, Flutter and HTML

help_page.title: Help and Support Center | Dev Learning Apps - FAQ and Contact
help_page.description: Complete help center for DevLearning apps. Detailed FAQ, password recovery, premium issues, email contact and form. 24/7 support.
help_page.subtitle: Find quick answers to your questions about our apps

forgot_password.question: I forgot my password. How to recover?
forgot_password.answer: Tap "Forgot my password" and follow the recovery email. Check Spam/Trash and confirm the email entered.

multiple_devices.question: Can I use the same account on more than one device?
multiple_devices.answer: Yes. Log in with the same email. Progress and premium sync when opening connected.

new_phone.question: I changed phones. Will I lose my access?
new_phone.answer: No. Install the app and enter with the same email. If it doesn't unlock, use "Restore access".

premium_not_working.question: I paid and premium didn't unlock. What do I do?
premium_not_working.answer: Reopen the app online, check the purchase account and tap "Restore access". If it persists, send proof.

complete_pass.question: I bought the Complete Pass on the website. How do I use it in the apps?
complete_pass.answer: Enter with the same email used on the website and go to Profile → Restore access.

separate_purchase.question: Can I buy premium for each app separately?
separate_purchase.answer: Yes. Each app has its own price. The Complete Pass unlocks all.

duplicate_charge.question: I received a duplicate charge. How to proceed?
duplicate_charge.answer: Check the store/website order history and send the proof through the form.

report_bug.question: How to report a bug?
report_bug.answer: Send description, steps, screenshots/video, device model, OS version and app version through the form.

wrong_account.question: I bought with another store account.
wrong_account.answer: Access stays in the purchase account. Send the order and correct account for us to evaluate options.
